text: The Fresh Beat Band (originally known as The JumpArounds) is an American live- action musical children's television series created by Scott Kraft and Nadine van der Velde for Nick Jr.. It stars Jon Beavers, Tara Perry, Thomas Hobson, and Yvette Gonzalez-Nacer. The series aired from August 24, 2009 to January 4, 2014. The spinoff animated television series Fresh Beat Band of Spies aired on June 15, 2015.
